ValidationRule.description: Address related fields needs to be mandatory during prospect creation. Requirement# 585 Defect# D-0179
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "Prospect" && ( ISBLANK( BillingCity ) || ISBLANK( BillingCountry )|| ISBLANK( BillingStreet ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Address related fields needs to be mandatory during prospect creation.
